bio:
Plautis Carvain, an Imperial man, is a nobleman traveling through Skyrim with his wife Salonia Carvain, along with their bodyguard.
 He is a descendant of Narina Carvain, a countess of Bruma who lived centuries ago.
They are on their way to Vittoria Vici's wedding in Solitude. Plautis is worried about potentially being late for the wedding. They are carrying expensive gifts for the wedding. Vittori Vici is the cousin of Emperor Titus Mede the Second.
Plautis has a patronizing attitude.
name: Plautis Carvain
notes: Shawn - kinda done. He and his wife have a 2nd iteration for after they get robbed
